name: Sugar Cubed
description:
A SUGARY SITUATION!

Crash-landed on a candied alien planet, your only hope for escape is a rescue rocket perched atop a floating island high above your head. Thinking quickly, you realize you can use the sugary flora to your advantage - since everything here is made of sugar, you can GROW sugar and use it to GROW a way out of this sweet, sweet planet!

Best of luck, brave explorer!

-CONTROLS-

a / d - Move left / right

w / d - Move up / down on candy cane

f - Interact with sugar chute and crates

e - Inventory

Scroll wheel - Select Crop Type

Space - Plant / Harvest

Escape - Open / Close Menu

-CREDITS-

Developed by Team 1-307:

Alexander McLaughlin and Patrick Sherbondy

Made for the Kenney 2022 Game Jam
